Jacob's Blog

This blog will delve into the multifaceted aspects of an average middle school student who goes to an international school. You will be able to track his coding journey that will eventually manifest into a business venture.

About Me

  • I am 13 years old and is soon to be an eight grader at Seoul International School (SIS).
  • I was born on January 19th, 2011.
  • I have a twin brother.
  • My personality is INTP, which means I'm an introvert who enjoys thinking about solutions to different things.
  • My hobbies are playing basketball, debating, and collecting basketball shoes.
  • My favorite basketball player is Anthony Edwards.
  • My favorite basketball team is the Minnesota Timberwolves.
  • My favorite subject in school is english.
  • I am half Australian and half South Korean.
